description:
Montreal, Feb. 10, 2014 - Backend Scala Developer Alexandre Bergeron presents the basics of this object-functional programming and scripting language for general software applications running on the Java virtual machine.

Useful links:

* Scala: http://www.scala-lang.org
* Alexandre: http://sflx.ca/abergeron
* MP43: http://montrealpython.org/fr/2014/02/mp43/
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
title: Scala for Python developers
